entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Periods of rain over eastern sections. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow except periods of rain over eastern sections. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
